headline: Lam Research (NasdaqGS:LRCX) Amends Bylaws and Affirms US$0.23 Dividend
summary: Lam Research (NasdaqGS:LRCX) recently amended its company bylaws, enhancing shareholder rights, and approved a quarterly dividend, reflecting a focus on corporate governance and shareholder returns. These changes were announced as the company saw its stock price rise sharply by 33% over the last month. Against a backdrop of a modest 0.7% rise in the tech-heavy Nasdaq, Lam's performance was particularly significant. This increase coincided with corporate activities like the continuation of a...

headline: 3 Stocks to Buy From the Prospering Semiconductor Industry
summary: The Zacks Electronics - Semiconductors industry players like AVGO, LRCX and PI gain from the growing proliferation of AI, ML and consumer electronic devices.
